title: Zea
creator_credit: Jean-Jacques Leduc, Andre Leduc, Robert Forget and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A superb visual trick that will mystify its audience, this animated film transforms the commonplace into magic. The film presented a serious technical challenge because the subject was both elusive and explosive. A film to watch, enjoy and laugh about. Film without words.
creator_credit_for_label: Jean-Jacques Leduc, Andre Leduc, Robert Forget and National Film Board of Canada
